# deselectAssets(withIdentifiers:)

**Instance Method**

Deselects assets that are in a selected state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func deselectAssets(withIdentifiers identifiers: [String])
```

## Parameters

- **identifiers**: The list of identifiers to deselect.

## Discussion

This method ignores assets that are invalid or aren’t in a selected state, and if you don’t specify a library when calling [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/init(photoLibrary:)].
title: deselectAssets(withIdentifiers:)
